forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 13C. SSE winds shifting to WNW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 53F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.
